title: Impact of dosing strategy on clinical outcomes of patients with lupus nephritis initially treated with lower-than-recommended-dose cyclophosphamide
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Kittiphan Chienwichai, Aniwat Choomnirat, Sorawat Sangkaew, Nutthapong Sunanthamethee, Arunchai Chang
